snippet: The police said they had arrested the assailant, whom they identified as a 25-year-old man with the surname Gao from the city of Tonghua in Jilin Province.
abstract: The police said they had arrested the assailant, whom they identified as a 25-year-old man with the surname Gao from the city of Tonghua in Jilin Province.

byline.original: By DIDI KIRSTEN TATLOW and MIA LI

headline.main: Woman Dies After Stabbing Near Uniqlo in Beijing
